General.Name: Azure Power Global Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Azure Power Global Limited operates as an independent sustainable energy solutions provider and power producer in India. The company builds and operates grid-scale solar, wind, and hybrid projects; and supplies generated renewable power to government utilities, and independent industrial and commercial customers on long term fixed price contracts. It has total renewable energy portfolio of approximately 7.4 GWs of which approximately 2.9 GWs operational capacity and 4.5 GWs of capacity under construction and in the pipeline. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in New Delhi, India.
